lines.text: [breaks glass switch cover with fist, starting the Final Fusion sequence]

[removes the Gold Key and poses with it]
Goldion Hammer, hatsudô shônin!
[inserts Gold Key into his console, causing Mikoto's console to flip around]

[removes Gold Card from her jacket]
Ryôkai! Goldion Hammer, Safety device relieve!
[slides Gold Card into her console, and unlocks the Goldion Hammer]
